properties.name: FlowArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN), a unique identifier for any AWS resource, of the flow.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN), a unique identifier for any AWS resource, of the flow.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Immutable and has to be a unique against other VpcInterfaces in this Flow.

type.description: Immutable and has to be a unique against other VpcInterfaces in this Flow.

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: Role Arn MediaConnect can assumes to create ENIs in customer's account.

type.description: Role Arn MediaConnect can assumes to create ENIs in customer's account.

properties.name: SecurityGroupIds
properties.description: Security Group IDs to be used on ENI.

type.description: Security Group IDs to be used on ENI.

properties.name: SubnetId
properties.description: Subnet must be in the AZ of the Flow

type.description: Subnet must be in the AZ of the Flow

properties.name: NetworkInterfaceIds
properties.description: IDs of the network interfaces created in customer's account by MediaConnect.

type.description: IDs of the network interfaces created in customer's account by MediaConnect.
